Aug. 26, 1939 D Crimdon Park Contest
Crimdon Park Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
crimdon-park-contest
None
Recollections of Weber
Crimdon Park, Easington, County Durham Prizes - 1st £8 and trophy, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. March contest - 1st(£2) Thornley Colliery, 2nd(£1) Durham Shakespeare, 3rd Easington Colliery. Hymn tune contest - 1st(£1) Thornley Colliery, 2nd(10s.) Wingate Colliery. 9 bands competed
Nov. 26, 2013, 8:20 a.m. Jan. 25, 2019, 2:33 p.m.
